answers.answer:
Medical devices are items such as prostheses, orthoses, and equipment for oxygen or aerosol therapy, intended for the recovery of organic or functional deficiencies on an outpatient basis. They are typically received by patients based on a medical prescription issued by a doctor in contractual relation with the health insurance house.

You can find more detailed information by visiting the website dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and reading the content under the section titled "Medical devices".
answers.bResponse:
Medical devices are items such as prostheses, orthoses, and equipment for oxygen or aerosol therapy, intended for the recovery of organic or functional deficiencies on an outpatient basis. They are typically received by patients based on a medical prescription issued by a doctor in contractual relation with the health insurance house.

You can find more detailed information by visiting the website dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and reading the content under the section titled "Medical devices". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
Yes, a medical prescription issued by a doctor is required to obtain medical devices. It is a necessary document for both the application process with the health insurance house and for obtaining the device from a provider.

To find detailed information, go to the website `https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices`. You can find this information in the first paragraph under the "Medical devices" section and further elaborated under "The procedure for obtaining the devices."
answers.bResponse:

You can find this information in the first paragraph under the "Medical devices" section and further elaborated under "The procedure for obtaining the devices." For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
A medical prescription for medical devices is valid for 30 days from the date of issue, provided it is submitted to the health insurance company within this period.

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the first paragraph under the "Medical devices" section.

answers.answer:
Medical devices are issued to patients only by providers who are under contract with the health insurance house.

You can find this information by visiting the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and reading the details under the "Medical devices" section.
answers.bResponse:
Medical devices are issued to patients only by providers who are under contract with the health insurance house.

You can find this information by visiting the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and reading the details under the "Medical devices" section. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
Yes, for certain medical devices with prices higher than those settled by CNAS, insured persons may need to cover an amount. However, beneficiaries from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine are exempt from any personal contribution.

You can find this information on the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices under the section titled "Medical devices".
answers.bResponse:
Yes, for certain medical devices with prices higher than those settled by CNAS, insured persons may need to cover an amount. However, beneficiaries from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine are exempt from any personal contribution.

You can find this information on the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices under the section titled "Medical devices". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
Yes, beneficiaries of Emergency Ordinance no.15/2022, which includes foreign citizens or stateless persons from the armed conflict in Ukraine, are not required to pay any personal contribution for medical devices.

To find detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read under the "Medical devices" section.
answers.bResponse:
Yes, beneficiaries of Emergency Ordinance no.15/2022, which includes foreign citizens or stateless persons from the armed conflict in Ukraine, are not required to pay any personal contribution for medical devices.

To find detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read under the "Medical devices" section. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
The basic package for medical devices for outpatient recovery covers ENT prosthetic devices, ostomy prosthetic devices, urinary retention and/or incontinence devices, limb prostheses, spine or limb orthoses, footwear orthopedics, devices for visual impairment, equipment for oxygen therapy and non-invasive ventilation, devices for aerosol therapy, walking devices, and external breast prostheses.

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read under the section titled 'Medical devices'. The specific list is provided in the paragraph that begins with "The basic package for medical devices intended for the recovery of organic or functional deficiencies on an outpatient basis includes:".
answers.bResponse:
The basic package for medical devices for outpatient recovery covers ENT prosthetic devices, ostomy prosthetic devices, urinary retention and/or incontinence devices, limb prostheses, spine or limb orthoses, footwear orthopedics, devices for visual impairment, equipment for oxygen therapy and non-invasive ventilation, devices for aerosol therapy, walking devices, and external breast prostheses.

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read under the section titled 'Medical devices'. The specific list is provided in the paragraph that begins with "The basic package for medical devices intended for the recovery of organic or functional deficiencies on an outpatient basis includes:". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
The overall procedure involves obtaining a medical prescription from a doctor, submitting an application with required documents to the health insurance house for approval, and then using the approval decision and prescription to obtain the device from a contracted provider.

You can find detailed information on this procedure by visiting the website `https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices` and reading under the section titled "The procedure for obtaining the devices".
answers.bResponse:
The overall procedure involves obtaining a medical prescription from a doctor, submitting an application with required documents to the health insurance house for approval, and then using the approval decision and prescription to obtain the device from a contracted provider.

You can find detailed information on this procedure by visiting the website `https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices` and reading under the section titled "The procedure for obtaining the devices". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
When applying for medical devices, you need to submit a copy of your ID, the medical prescription for the device, and, if applicable, the classification certificate for oxygen therapy or non-invasive ventilation. For children up to 14 years old, a copy of their birth certificate is also required, along with the medical prescription specifying their address.

You can find this detailed information on the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices under the section titled 'The procedure for obtaining the devices'.
answers.bResponse:
When applying for medical devices, you need to submit a copy of your ID, the medical prescription for the device, and, if applicable, the classification certificate for oxygen therapy or non-invasive ventilation. For children up to 14 years old, a copy of their birth certificate is also required, along with the medical prescription specifying their address.

You can find this detailed information on the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices under the section titled 'The procedure for obtaining the devices'. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
The health insurance house is obligated to analyze and decide on the acceptance or rejection of a medical device application within no more than 3 working days from the date of its registration.

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and look under the section "The procedure for obtaining the devices".
answers.bResponse:

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and look under the section "The procedure for obtaining the devices". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
If requests for devices exceed the approved monthly fund, priority lists are established by device category.

To find this information, go to the website `https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices` and read under the section titled "The procedure for obtaining the devices".

answers.answer:
The approval decision for medical devices is issued by the health insurance house and can be picked up by the beneficiary, a first or second degree relative, spouse, or legal representative, or sent by post upon request.

To find more detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read under the section titled "The procedure for obtaining the devices."

To find more detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read under the section titled "The procedure for obtaining the devices." For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices

answers.answer:
To collect the medical device from a provider after approval, you need the decision issued by the health insurance house and the medical prescription.

You can find this detailed information on the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices under the section titled "The procedure for obtaining the devices," specifically in the last paragraph of that section.

answers.answer:
Yes, applications and documents for medical devices can be submitted remotely to the health insurance house by post or online. Documents can also be sent to the device supplier by post or courier.

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read under the section titled "The procedure for obtaining the devices".
